programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: Kolekcija videobiografija najvećih holivudskih zvijezda. Emisija "Close Up" gledateljima pred malim ekranima donosi intervjue s najvećim hollywoodskim zvijezdama, ali i zanimljivosti vezane uz svijet filma. Uživajte uz zabavne i zanimljive minute ove biografske emisije!

programme.title: Hollywood Singing and Dancing: A Musical History
Hollywood Singing And Dancing
programme.desc:
Hollywood Singing and Dancing: A Musical History: Directed by Mark McLaughlin. With Obba Babatundé, John Badham, Robert S. Birchard, Nikki Blonsky. A look at the history of musical movies hosted by Shirley Jones. Full of clips and behind the scenes stories that any movie buff will appreciate." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1267421/","name":"Hollywood Singing and Dancing: A Musical History","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE2MGMwNzMtNDVjNC00NDc2LTlhNDYtM2MyYmUwZWQ4NzFkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjAyMzE2MjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the history of musical movies hosted by Shirley Jones. Full of clips and behind the scenes stories that any movie buff will appreciate.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1267421/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MartinHafer"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"One step beyond "That's Entertainment!"","reviewBody":"Back in the 1970s, "That's Entertainment" turned out to be a surprise hit, as folks flocked to the theaters to see a celebration of the MGM musical. It was a very good film and led to two sequels. However, the films are flawed in one way--they ignored the musicals of rival studios, such as RKO, MGM and Twentieth Century-Fox. So, for that reason alone, "Hollywood Singing and Dancing: A Musical History" is a better film for someone wanting to learn about the history of this genre. Now I am not saying it's perfect--but it is darn good because its clips are not restricted to a single studio.

So what are the film's deficits and assets? Well, on the plus side, it not only talks about ALL the studio's musicals but it also extends to today, since it's a new film. Also, the interviews are quite nice and there are tons of clips. On the negative side, the clips were occasionally fuzzy (especially the earlier ones) and the film is NOT completely comprehensive. Many important films are omitted and you'd get the impression that Busby Berkeley did EVERY musical from the 30s (he actually did far less than most people think). But this can be forgiven, you the film was not intended as a mini-series (which it really needed for so much material). Unless you absolutely hate musicals, this film is for you and well worth seeing.

By the way, I really wished the film had talked about some of the flops of the genre--such as "Camelot", "Paint Your Wagon", "Can't Stop the Music" or "Xanadu" (among others). Now THAT would make for an interesting film!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":101,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"genre":["Documentary","Musical"],"datePublished":"2008-10-14","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0044762/","name":"Obba Babatundé"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000824/","name":"John Badham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0083306/","name":"Robert S. Birchard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0572385/","name":"Mark McLaughlin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0227529/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1415454/","name":"Phillip Dye"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2854060/","name":"Denise Hamilton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1238474/","name":"Tasha Lowe-Newsome"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Chocolat
Čokolada
programme.desc:
Chocolat: Directed by Lasse Hallström. With Alfred Molina, Carrie-Anne Moss, Aurelien Parent Koenig, Antonio Gil. A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0241303/","name":"Chocolat","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYWYwMjMxZWQtMzQ3OS00YWNhLThkNDItYTk4NDdhZDE4ZTEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODU5MDg5OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A French woman and her young daughter open up a chocolate shop in a small remote village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0241303/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Travis_Bickle01"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable comedy-drama directed by Lasse Hallström","reviewBody":"Beautiful movie from master-director Lasse Hallström (The Cider House Rules, The Shipping News, What's Eating Gilbert Grape) with wonderful performances by Juliette Binoche, Judi Dench, and Hallström's wife Lena Olin. "Chocolat" is a very beautiful and touching movie about a single mother with a daughter who decides to open a "chocolaterie" in a very conservative village during Lent. What follows almost looks like a fairytale: the characters, the story, the music, the whole idea of an old conservative French village 

I liked the movie a lot. It has everything: a laugh, a cry, a wonderful story and some amazing acting performances. Juliette Binoche is made to play this kind of caring and sensitive women. Although Johnny Depp had a very small part in this movie, he was excellent as always. I personally think that Judi Dench gave one of her best performances in "Chocolat", truly great acting! Maybe not Hallström's best; I liked "What's Eating Gilbert Grape" and "The Cider House Rules" more; but certainly worth watching.

8/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":184330,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2001-10-24","keywords":"chocolate,france,village,food,magical realism","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Chocolat","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2733547033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDRjNGI4MmYtY2U1ZS00N2UzLTk5MzgtMjIxYjlhMDI2NWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDRjNGI4MmYtY2U1ZS00N2UzLTk5MzgtMjIxYjlhMDI2NWVhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000300/","name":"Juliette Binoche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001132/","name":"Judi Dench"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000547/","name":"Alfred Molina"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002120/","name":"Lasse Hallström"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0031919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0104130/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0364862/","name":"Joanne Harris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0414608/","name":"Robert Nelson Jacobs"}],"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ring of the Nibelungs
Prsten Nibelunga
programme.desc:
Ring of the Nibelungs: Directed by Uli Edel. With Benno Fürmann, Kristanna Loken, Alicia Witt, Julian Sands. The legend of Siegfried and Brunhild, loosely based on characters from the Norse sagas and the pre-Christian Germanic heroic motifs outlined in the Nibelungensaga." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0387541/","name":"Ring of the Nibelungs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3YTM1MmQtZGNmYi00MTJkLTlmMTUtMjlkYWNiZjc4NjcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxNjcxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The legend of Siegfried and Brunhild, loosely based on characters from the Norse sagas and the pre-Christian Germanic heroic motifs outlined in the Nibelungensaga.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0387541/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Arne-Mueller"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disappointing Ending","reviewBody":"Actually it started out OK but the ending was really crappy. Imagine "LOTR: The Fellowship of the Ring" end with Frodo destroying the Ring just because the director wanted the story to fit into a 3h time frame.

The left out Act 2 and 3 of the Nibelung Saga where Kriemhild kills here Brothers, Sacrifies here Family, her Children and here country just in the name of revenging here husband. Where Hagen hides the gold of the Nibelungs in the Rhein never to be found again.

This really is what the Nibelung Saga makes it that great and tragic and they killed it off.

So I was pretty disappointed in the entire movie after seeing the end. In summary I cannot recommend this Movie what SAT1 called "The Movie event of the year" they better should have made it into a 2-3 parter which the actual story being told. So if you want to see the Nibelungs their was an film made in the 70's which the whole story in it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9499,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-12-23","keywords":"love potion,dragon,queen,king,blacksmith","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dark Kingdom: The Dragon King","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3600810265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc4MDIyMDctM2NlOC00NjAwLWEwNmItODg4Y2E4YTRiNzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc4MDIyMDctM2NlOC00NjAwLWEwNmItODg4Y2E4YTRiNzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"aka. programme.desc:
Ring of the Nibelungs: Directed by Uli Edel. With Benno Fürmann, Kristanna Loken, Alicia Witt, Julian Sands. The legend of Siegfried and Brunhild, loosely based on characters from the Norse sagas and the pre-Christian Germanic heroic motifs outlined in the Nibelungensaga." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0387541/","name":"Ring of the Nibelungs","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE3YTM1MmQtZGNmYi00MTJkLTlmMTUtMjlkYWNiZjc4NjcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODUxNjcxNjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The legend of Siegfried and Brunhild, loosely based on characters from the Norse sagas and the pre-Christian Germanic heroic motifs outlined in the Nibelungensaga.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0387541/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Arne-Mueller"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disappointing Ending","reviewBody":"Actually it started out OK but the ending was really crappy. Imagine "LOTR: The Fellowship of the Ring" end with Frodo destroying the Ring just because the director wanted the story to fit into a 3h time frame.

The left out Act 2 and 3 of the Nibelung Saga where Kriemhild kills here Brothers, Sacrifies here Family, her Children and here country just in the name of revenging here husband. Where Hagen hides the gold of the Nibelungs in the Rhein never to be found again.

This really is what the Nibelung Saga makes it that great and tragic and they killed it off.

So I was pretty disappointed in the entire movie after seeing the end. In summary I cannot recommend this Movie what SAT1 called "The Movie event of the year" they better should have made it into a 2-3 parter which the actual story being told. So if you want to see the Nibelungs their was an film made in the 70's which the whole story in it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9499,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-12-23","keywords":"love potion,dragon,queen,king,blacksmith","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Dark Kingdom: The Dragon King","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3600810265","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc4MDIyMDctM2NlOC00NjAwLWEwNmItODg4Y2E4YTRiNzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODc4MDIyMDctM2NlOC00NjAwLWEwNmItODg4Y2E4YTRiNzYzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"aka. programme.title: The Net
Mreža
programme.desc: The Net: Directed by Irwin Winkler. With Sandra Bullock, Jeremy Northam, Dennis Miller, Diane Baker. A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0113957/","name":"The Net","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTg5YmM5NzktN2Q0OS00YzE1LThkOTktNTE1NTJkZmExNmIxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDAxNjkxNjQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A computer programmer stumbles upon a conspiracy, putting her life and the lives of those around her in great danger.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0113957/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moonspinner55"},"dateCreated":"2002-05-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Flimsy, far-fetched, but spunky and attractive","reviewBody":"Sandra Bullock is very appealing as an unloved independent systems analyst who unknowingly gets hold of a disk that could bring worldwide chaos; pretty soon, she's dodging bad guys, running from the cops and putting her allies in danger (including Dennis Miller, who is surprisingly good). Despite a penchant for filming mouths in close-up, Irwin Winkler has directed a very fast, fun technical-thriller in which charming Bullock is bounced from one nightmare to another. I loved the way she gets out of a building swarming with security: she dons a fireman's outfit and escapes, but then the bad guys see a nicely piled fireman's outfit (and helmet!) sitting on the sidewalk and yell, "She's getting away!" Just one example of how this movie is so completely brainless, but yet entertaining enough on a non-think level that you tell yourself not to notice. You'll hate yourself in the morning, though. **1/2 from ****","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":63896,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1995-07-28","keywords":"computer,identity,identity theft,computer hacker,chat room","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Net","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2046230809","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjlkNjAzMDctYTY2YS00NGJkLTkxNGUtNDEyMGFiNjkwYjk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjlkNjAzMDctYTY2YS00NGJkLTkxNGUtNDEyMGFiNjkwYjk2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000113/","name":"Sandra Bullock"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000562/","name":"Jeremy Northam"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588222/","name":"Dennis Miller"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005563/","name":"Irwin Winkler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049390/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104335/","name":"John Brancato"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0274905/","name":"Michael Ferris"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Equilibrium
Ekvilibrij
programme.desc:
Equilibrium: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Christian Bale, Dominic Purcell, Sean Bean, Christian Kahrmann. In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0238380/","name":"Equilibrium","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMzA1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUyMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0238380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Anonymous_Maxine"},"dateCreated":"2008-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":""Equilibrium" is really hard to type.","reviewBody":"I bought Equilibrium just because Christian Bale is in it. To tell you the truth I was certain that it was going to be a goofy, direct-to-video sci-fi fiasco that most involved would just as soon forget. The cover box reminded me of Universal Soldier. As it turns out however, it's not a movie that those involved want to forget, it's an overlooked gem, no doubt because it came at the height of the Matrix craze, which it may resemble in too many ways. Unfortunately, too many people will callously write it off as a Matrix rip-off, and it's a shame because this is one of the best science fiction films to have come along in quite some time. 

It takes place in the far off 21st century, but it's not about the future (given that it exists in a future that can't ever exist), it's about the disturbing reality that war is a part of human nature, and in order to eradicate it from the modern world we would have to become a homogenized society of emotionless, drug-controlled zombies. No jokes about that already being a reality.

The movie's biggest assertion is that it assigns blame for man's inhumanity to man to his ability to feel (ignoring the real causes, such as religion, political power, and less dogmatic things like national pride and human rights). The current government is based on enforcing the mass removal of emotion from the masses using a drug called Prozium, and is the source of the movie's main irony, that in order to eradicate war, it has waged war on all of it's own citizens, who constantly live under close surveillance. 

The government employs Grammaton Clerics to handle that surveillance. They are highly trained officers authorized to kill anyone they deem to be "sense offenders" on the spot ("I trust you'll be more vigilant in the future?"). There is, in fact, a staggering amount of irony in the film, given that all emotion or feeling is strictly forbidden under penalty of death, and yet anger, suspicion and fear are all alive and well, and even flaunted. It's also interesting to consider that in real life it is the dogmatic, Cleric-like believers who aspire for war, and the normal people who just want to live their lives. 

For the most part the movie ignores the fact that it is governments that wage war, not citizens (even emotionally sensitive ones), but no matter. The important thing that you need to know about the movie is that it goes way, way too far, and because of that, it's fun. I cheered out loud several times during the film because the gun fights, which are so unrealistic it's almost funny, are genuinely well-choreographed and exciting. If I may say so, this is what gun fights in hard core science fiction movies should look like.

Many people criticize the movie for being unrealistic or too extreme, altogether forgetting what kind of movie they're watching in the first place. The movie is not about moral dilemmas, even though the main character suffers a tremendous one, it's a fast, gritty science fiction movie that makes no apologies, and owes none. The characterization may be just a little heavy (Bale's character going from not understanding a question about what he felt when his wife was incinerated to having a soft spot for puppies, etc.), but like another outstanding and equally over-the-top film, Shoot 'Em Up, nothing is out of place. All of the excesses look right at home. 

It is interesting to consider the real-world implications of the content of the movie though, regardless of how unrealistic it is. The totalitarian regime, for example, resembles Mao Tse- tung's manner of oppression with startling closeness, even down to the children spying on and reporting their parents. Under Mao, children who reported their parents engaging in "counter'-revolutionary activities" were publicly hailed as national heroes while their parents were generally tortured and executed. Whether the crimes were real or not was unimportant, what mattered is that, as you can imagine, in a society where people were so easily made to desperately fear their own children, you can imagine the level of control the government (Mao) had over the people. Something similar happens in this movie.

The similarities to The Matrix films are obvious, but limited mostly to superficial things like the fight scenes and some costumes. Thematically, the movies are totally different, and even with all of the similarities, this movie is more than able to stand on its own, and any similarities are more just an unfortunate bit of timing, as this is probably what caused the movie to be so overlooked. If you can't handle a little excess in the movies, definitely stay away from this one. But if you can watch a movie just for a good time, you could do a lot worse than this.

IMDb data; ttnr: 0238380, Title: Equilibrium, --- Description: Equilibrium: Directed by Kurt Wimmer. With Christian Bale, Dominic Purcell, Sean Bean, Christian Kahrmann. In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0238380/","name":"Equilibrium","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkzMzA1OTI3N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMzUyMDg5._V1_.jpg","description":"In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0238380/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Anonymous_Maxine","dateCreated":"2008-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":""Equilibrium" is really hard to type.","reviewBody":"I bought Equilibrium just because Christian Bale is in it. To tell you the truth I was certain that it was going to be a goofy, direct-to-video sci-fi fiasco that most involved would just as soon forget. The cover box reminded me of Universal Soldier. As it turns out however, it's not a movie that those involved want to forget, it's an overlooked gem, no doubt because it came at the height of the Matrix craze, which it may resemble in too many ways. Unfortunately, too many people will callously write it off as a Matrix rip-off, and it's a shame because this is one of the best science fiction films to have come along in quite some time. 

It takes place in the far off 21st century, but it's not about the future (given that it exists in a future that can't ever exist), it's about the disturbing reality that war is a part of human nature, and in order to eradicate it from the modern world we would have to become a homogenized society of emotionless, drug-controlled zombies. No jokes about that already being a reality.

The movie's biggest assertion is that it assigns blame for man's inhumanity to man to his ability to feel (ignoring the real causes, such as religion, political power, and less dogmatic things like national pride and human rights). The current government is based on enforcing the mass removal of emotion from the masses using a drug called Prozium, and is the source of the movie's main irony, that in order to eradicate war, it has waged war on all of it's own citizens, who constantly live under close surveillance. 

The government employs Grammaton Clerics to handle that surveillance. They are highly trained officers authorized to kill anyone they deem to be "sense offenders" on the spot ("I trust you'll be more vigilant in the future?"). There is, in fact, a staggering amount of irony in the film, given that all emotion or feeling is strictly forbidden under penalty of death, and yet anger, suspicion and fear are all alive and well, and even flaunted. It's also interesting to consider that in real life it is the dogmatic, Cleric-like believers who aspire for war, and the normal people who just want to live their lives. 

For the most part the movie ignores the fact that it is governments that wage war, not citizens (even emotionally sensitive ones), but no matter. The important thing that you need to know about the movie is that it goes way, way too far, and because of that, it's fun. I cheered out loud several times during the film because the gun fights, which are so unrealistic it's almost funny, are genuinely well-choreographed and exciting. If I may say so, this is what gun fights in hard core science fiction movies should look like.

Many people criticize the movie for being unrealistic or too extreme, altogether forgetting what kind of movie they're watching in the first place. The movie is not about moral dilemmas, even though the main character suffers a tremendous one, it's a fast, gritty science fiction movie that makes no apologies, and owes none. The characterization may be just a little heavy (Bale's character going from not understanding a question about what he felt when his wife was incinerated to having a soft spot for puppies, etc.), but like another outstanding and equally over-the-top film, Shoot 'Em Up, nothing is out of place. All of the excesses look right at home. 

It is interesting to consider the real-world implications of the content of the movie though, regardless of how unrealistic it is. The totalitarian regime, for example, resembles Mao Tse- tung's manner of oppression with startling closeness, even down to the children spying on and reporting their parents. Under Mao, children who reported their parents engaging in "counter'-revolutionary activities" were publicly hailed as national heroes while their parents were generally tortured and executed. Whether the crimes were real or not was unimportant, what mattered is that, as you can imagine, in a society where people were so easily made to desperately fear their own children, you can imagine the level of control the government (Mao) had over the people. Something similar happens in this movie.

The similarities to The Matrix films are obvious, but limited mostly to superficial things like the fight scenes and some costumes. Thematically, the movies are totally different, and even with all of the similarities, this movie is more than able to stand on its own, and any similarities are more just an unfortunate bit of timing, as this is probably what caused the movie to be so overlooked. If you can't handle a little excess in the movies, definitely stay away from this one. But if you can watch a movie just for a good time, you could do a lot worse than this.

programme.title: Ubijanje Eve
programme.desc: Eve je operativka sigurnosne službe. Veoma je pametna, dosadan joj je kancelarijski posao, i ne ispunjava njena maštanja o tome da postane špijun. Villanelle je otmjena, voli luksuz, koji joj pruža... Eve je operativka sigurnosne službe. Veoma je pametna, dosadan joj je kancelarijski posao, i ne ispunjava njena maštanja o tome da postane špijun. Villanelle je otmjena, voli luksuz, koji joj pruža njen muž, ali je i talentirana ubica... Ove dvije izrazito inteligentne žene, podjednako opsjednute jedna drugom, direktno se sukobljavaju u epskoj igri mačke i miša.

programme.desc: The 6th Day: Directed by Roger Spottiswoode. With Arnold Schwarzenegger, Michael Rapaport, Tony Goldwyn, Michael Rooker. A man meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0216216/","name":"The 6th Day","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1OTU5OTU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwMjMxMDk2._V1_.jpg","description":"A man meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0216216/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"npel"},"dateCreated":"2001-03-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Multiplicity meets Total Recall","reviewBody":"This movie felt like a combination of Michael Keaton's 1996 clone comedy, Multiplicity and Schwarzenegger's own Total Recall. Schwarzenegger is a helicopter pilot who after signing a big chartering contract with a wealthy tycoon, returns home on the night of his birthday and discovers that he's already home enjoying his birthday cake. Through the rest of the film, Arney is running from the bad guys who are trying to kill him for seeing his double and trying to learn why he has been cloned. I didn't mind this film and I actually found myself chuckling at Arnold's remarks after each kill. The dialog between the two Schwarzenegger's was kind of tacky but the special effects and action sequences make up for that. I wonder how much World Wrestling Federation owner Vince McMahon paid out to have his new XFL football league appear in the film?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":119226,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2001-02-07","keywords":"evil man,cloning,clone,future,laser gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The 6th Day","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1502478617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZlYjkwMzYtZmVjOS00YzcyLThkNTctYjFhYjA3ZDA1NzQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzZlYjkwMzYtZmVjOS00YzcyLThkNTctYjFhYjA3ZDA1NzQzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000216/","name":"Arnold Schwarzenegger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001650/","name":"Michael Rapaport"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001282/","name":"Tony Goldwyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006854/","name":"Roger Spottiswoode"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0029574/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926727/","name":"Cormac Wibberley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0926729/","name":"Marianne Wibberley"}],"duration":"PT2H3M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes
Greystoke: Legenda o Tarzanu
programme.desc: Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes: Directed by Hugh Hudson. With Ralph Richardson, Ian Holm, James Fox, Christopher Lambert. A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087365/","name":"Greystoke: The Legend of Tarzan, Lord of the Apes","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2NmYjZjOGItYTQ0ZC00YjcyLTk3MWUtYzdmZjY1MGNkMDViXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087365/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Pegasus7"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Quite surprisingly enjoyable","reviewBody":"Once you get past the first notion of the unlikeliness of the actual events in the story, you'll enjoy this film a lot more. I have seen this movie several times, and still enjoy it. Although i find Christopher Lambert a mediocre actor in most of his films, i feel that he shines here (a good idea to let him speak in his native French accent, cleverly written into the script by means of the Belgian explorer who finds him)instead of making him put on a bizarre accent, and it works well. Ian Holm and Ralph Richardson are fantastic and moving, but McDowell spoils it again and most of her scenes are irritating to watch. Some of this movie was actually quite upsetting (the taxidermy labs and the scene where the ape/father is shot) but very well done. The scenery is fantastic, and the musical score is brilliant and stirring. Great make-up effects for its day. This movie is well worth watching, give it a try, you might be pleasantly surprised!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19641,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1984-03-30","keywords":"year 1885,shipwreck,africa,ape,orphan","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1200997145","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjg3NWI4MmUtY2UzOC00OWUxLTk5MTYtMzNkYzc2MGQyMzU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjg3NWI4MmUtY2UzOC00OWUxLTk5MTYtMzNkYzc2MGQyMzU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000483/","name":"Christopher Lambert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000510/","name":"Andie MacDowell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724732/","name":"Ralph Richardson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0399853/","name":"Hugh Hudson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0128312/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043388/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123194/","name":"Edgar Rice Burroughs"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001801/","name":"Robert Towne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0042472/","name":"Michael Austin"}],"duration":"PT2H23M"}</script><metacontent="

This movie is well worth watching, give it a try, you might be pleasantly surprised!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":19641,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"1984-03-30","keywords":"year 1885,shipwreck,africa,ape,orphan","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1200997145","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjg3NWI4MmUtY2UzOC00OWUxLTk5MTYtMzNkYzc2MGQyMzU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjg3NWI4MmUtY2UzOC00OWUxLTk5MTYtMzNkYzc2MGQyMzU1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A missing heir of respected Scottish family, raised in African jungles by animals, finally returns to his estate only to realize that difference between the two worlds is really significant.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000483/","name":"Christopher Lambert","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000510/","name":"Andie MacDowell","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0724732/","name":"Ralph Richardson"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0399853/","name":"Hugh Hudson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0128312/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043388/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0123194/","name":"Edgar Rice Burroughs","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001801/","name":"Robert Towne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0042472/","name":"Michael Austin"],"duration":"PT2H23M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Treasure Island: Directed by Fraser C. Heston. With Charlton Heston, Christian Bale, Oliver Reed, Christopher Lee. The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate Captain Long John Silver." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0100813/","name":"Treasure Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjEzZmVhOGEtNTMxMy00YmE4LTk1YzQtMjcxMWI1ZDc2MWJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The treasure seeking adventures of young Jim Hawkins and pirate Captain Long John Silver.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100813/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"hans101067"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Rousing Adaptation Follows Novel Closely","reviewBody":"This version of Stevenson's masterpiece is probably the one that most closely follows the novel.It appears that they must have had a copy alongside when they were writing the script.Oh,we can certainly have criticisms,of inaccuracies,and diversions,but they're so small.Bale is some flat as Jim Hawkins,and he does appear a little dull-witted(which is NOT the same as being stupid)but what of it.He's the closest in age of any interpreter.I've heard people complain of Heston being cast against type as Silver,stating that he's not doing a hero.Nonsense!Silver happens to be an evil hero!Wood's Smollet is a little too young for the character,and Halsey and Coyle are both much too young for theirs(Hands and Morgan are described as rather elderly pirates)but what of it?They do a fine job.The fight at the stockade is much more elaborate than was described in the book,but can we have a Heston film that doesn't have an epic battle?Besides,it's so much fun.And Silver's escape is not as described in the novel,but it's so original,and so much in character,that we have to cheer the old blackguard in his resourcefulness.Get the video,stock up lots of beverages,make lots of popcorn,and settle back for a rousing,rollicking good time."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5104,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"Not programme.title: The New Guy
Nova faca
programme.desc: The New Guy: Directed by Ed Decter. With DJ Qualls, Eliza Dushku, Zooey Deschanel, Jerod Mixon. A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0241760/","name":"The New Guy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzg4MDljNzYtNjNmNC00OThkLWIzMGEtZDc2Y2Y4MWZkNTc5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A high school senior branded uncool in the ninth grade gets himself expelled so he changes his image to cool kid at the town's other high school.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0241760/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sigmoid23"},"dateCreated":"2006-01-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's not about the story. It's about the fun.","reviewBody":"A lot of people will say the plot of this movie was lame, predictable and dumb and yeah, they're right. But this kind of movie isn't about a brilliant plot. It's about interesting characters and silly gags and parodying those more serious types of movies. There are some funny lines, sight gags and slapstick, some cute girls, the bad guys get what's coming to them and the good guys win. Throw in some surprising celebrity cameos (some of which you might not catch until the credits roll) and a great soundtrack that mixes old and new songs and that's what I call entertainment.\n\nThe cast is noteworthy too. DJ Qualls, of course, Zooey Deschanel (the chick from Elf), Eddie Griffin, Lyle Lovett, Jerod Mixon, Parry Shen, Matt Gogin etc. did a fine job. If you can watch a movie without being hypercritical about how "bad" it is, then get this, sit back a have some laughs","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34716,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2002-05-10","keywords":"teenage boy,teenage girl,attempted escape,three word title,bass guitar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The New Guy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1978728729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2MTUyNGUtOTk2NS00OTRiLTk4MzctNzVjNzIxZGVlNWRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2MTUyNGUtOTk2NS00OTRiLTk4MzctNzVjNzIxZGVlNWRiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Columbia Tristar"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0702809/","name":"DJ Qualls"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005164/","name":"Lyle Lovett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0244630/","name":"Eliza Dushku"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0214036/","name":"Ed Decter"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0003580/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063206/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024252/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0447583/","name":"David Kendall"}],"duration":"PT1H28M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cube Zero
Kocka: Početak
programme.desc:
Cube Zero: Directed by Ernie Barbarash. With Zachary Bennett, David Huband, Stephanie Moore, Martin Roach. A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0377713/","name":"Cube Zero","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA3ZmQ3YWQtM2ViNS00Mzk4LTk1ZWQtMWIyZTdkYzA5NjJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young programmer whose job is to watch over the reality-warping Cube defies orders to rescue an innocent mother trapped in one of its rooms.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0377713/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"morphion2"},"dateCreated":"2005-11-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not Awful, but Unnecessary","reviewBody":"Following the release of Cube 2: Hypercube (2003), and playing off the alleged success of the original Cube (1998), Director Ernie Barbarash takes the liberty of bringing us the third installment in the trilogy, the prequel Cube Zero.

Deep in the bowels of a giant and faceless institution, time and place unknown, two low-ranking operators, Wynn (Zachary Bennett) and Dodd (David Huband) sit and observe on monitors the behavior of people that have been placed in a giant network of cubic chambers, some of which are rigged with death traps. Told that the people they are observing are convicted felons who chose this horrific and deadly ordeal over a lethal injection, these observers have had no problem with their jobs until Wynn, a mathematical genius, discovers that one of the prisoners, a woman named Cassandra (Stephanie Moore) never agreed to be put inside the Cube. Suddenly it's realized that perhaps their "jobs" are not what they seem, and that they may be part of something deeply sick and twisted...

For people that have seen and enjoyed the original Cube, this prequel will probably not be to your liking. It's not that the story does not have potential; it's simply that the first Cube film never needed to be expanded on. Standing alone, it is a neat little psychological thriller with very interesting concepts and a certainty about its own message. It was also nicely self-contained. The problem with Cube Zero is that it destroys some of the mystique of the original, attempting to answer questions with more questions but only really resulting in making a mess of what never needed fixing.

What this new film has to offer, which is questions about the psychological nature of authoritarianism and the banality of evil, certainly are good questions to be raised, but probably should have been done so on their own merits, rather than as a continuation of a film that had no such aspirations.

Having said this, the other traits of the film, such as acting and direction and writing, are not awful. There is a bleak, dark look to the film akin to such film noir as 'The Matrix' and 'Dark City', and they have certainly managed to recapture the claustrophobic feeling of the first Cube. Unfortunately for Barbarash, these are not enough positive qualities to save it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":39410,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2004-11-10","keywords":"cyberpunk,part of trilogy,third part,underwater scene,countdown","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0072124/","name":"Zachary Bennett"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601890/","name":"Stephanie Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0730045/","name":"Martin Roach"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053228/","name":"Ernie Barbarash"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0109435/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0086772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016889/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0053228/","name":"Ernie Barbarash"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: From Dusk Till Dawn: Directed by Robert Rodriguez. With George Clooney, Quentin Tarantino, Harvey Keitel, Juliette Lewis. Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0116367/","name":"From Dusk Till Dawn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjk3YmZhMDAtOWUzMS00YjE5LTkxNzAtY2I1NGZjMDA2ZTk0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in a truck stop populated by vampires, with chaotic results.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0116367/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Son_of_Mansfield"},"dateCreated":"2003-07-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"If Seth Gecko had taken on those tomatoes, they never would have eaten France.","reviewBody":"George Clooney should have stuck will this kind of role. He did fine in Out of Sight and Ocean's Eleven, but he really dominated this movie with a fury that we may never see again. Almost every line he delivers is memorable and that is not all Tarantino's doing. The rest of the cast is dominated by cool cameos and veteran cult and mainstream names. The exception being Ernest Liu who does a good job of holding his own. No Tarantino film would be complete without a good soundtrack. This one, as with Desperado, features songs by Tito and Tarantula. Although I have only heard four songs by them, I consider them one of my favorites. I will never forget what my parents told me after they watched this without me. "You sure can pick 'em," my mother blurted with distain. Do not make my mistake, watch it with your parents to see them squirm.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":299216,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"datePublished":"1996-01-19","keywords":"stripper,held hostage,u.s. mexico border,priest,strip club","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"From Dusk Till Dawn","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3052320281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZDY5ODAtZDg2Ny00ZDJlLTk2YzgtNmEzMjZiOWFkYmZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODVjZDY5ODAtZDg2Ny00ZDJlLTk2YzgtNmEzMjZiOWFkYmZmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for From Dusk Till Dawn"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000172/","name":"Harvey Keitel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000123/","name":"George Clooney"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000496/","name":"Juliette Lewis"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001675/","name":"Robert Rodriguez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019626/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019267/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0870559/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476071/","name":"Robert Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000233/","name":"Quentin Tarantino"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Jeepers Creepers
Jeepers Creepers
programme.desc: Jeepers Creepers: Directed by Victor Salva. With Gina Philips, Justin Long, Jonathan Breck, Patricia Belcher. A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0263488/","name":"Jeepers Creepers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkwNDU0NTE0OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzAzNzQyMTI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0263488/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"KaterinaNV"},"dateCreated":"2002-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Entertaining, but not all that","reviewBody":"I found parts of this movie, mainly the beginning to be very promising. I really thought that it was going to be an 'on the edge of your seat' horror film and the opening had all the tension and weirdness that one needs to set that kind of atmosphere. But as the movie progressed, even though it never sunk to being bad or even mediocre (no Friday the 13th B.S. here), I think it became a little bit of a disappointment because it didn't live up to the promise that it made in the beginning. And although I like to let my mind fill in the blanks, there was a lot that went unexplained that made it so that I wasn't really satisfied by the time it finished. I didn't recognize the names of the actors or the director, and they were neither here nor there for me - that's not to say that I thought the performances were bad, they definitely were fitting and on the mark for the genre. It's just that they didn't really stick out for me.\n\nAll of the above being said, if the movie was on cable on a cold winter night, I'd probably relent and watch it again - it's certainly better than most in it's category, but would I recommend it as a 'great' film? No, probably not.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":119428,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Horror","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2001-08-31","keywords":"demon,wings,record player,eaten alive,scarecrow","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi10009113","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmExZThlMDUtODMzNC00Mjc0LThhYWUtMTZkYTcxYzVjMDI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmExZThlMDUtODMzNC00Mjc0LThhYWUtMTZkYTcxYzVjMDI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005312/","name":"Gina Philips"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0519043/","name":"Justin Long"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0106534/","name":"Jonathan Breck"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759207/","name":"Victor Salva"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0026841/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0020958/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092605/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0759207/","name":"Victor Salva"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Shield
programme.desc: Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom... Kapetan David Aceveda želi smanjiti stopu kriminala u svom okrugu Los Angeles. On se natječe s detektivom Vicom Mackeyjem i njegovim udarnim timom, specijalnom policijom koja se koristi nezakonitim metodama u borbi protiv kriminala, ali vrlo učinkovitim.

programme.title: The Quiet
The Shield
programme.desc: The Quiet: Directed by Jamie Babbit. With Elisha Cuthbert, Camilla Belle, Edie Falco, Martin Donovan. Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0414951/","name":"The Quiet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ4NDA4NDIyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDM5OTQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Following the unexpected death of her father, a deaf teenager moves in with her godparents, where she discovers the cruel behaviour of their daughter may be indicative of a dark secret within the family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0414951/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"trev89"},"dateCreated":"2006-09-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Offbeat Award","reviewBody":"This film is very different from everything else out there, which is one reason why it has gotten so much attention here on IMDb. Some love it, some hate it, just like every movie. The subject matter is not the most appealing to the public, but I think that it gives the movie character. Looking back I can see many of the things that should have been changed, but the movie is a break out. A different type of movie, it is so different than everything else out there. It is original, and out-there.\n\nWhen watching this film you MUST be open-minded. Do not look at any of the negative reviews and watch the movie fresh of mind. If you know everything that is going to happen it makes it less entertaining too. If you have no clue what the movie was about I think it also gives it that much more of a sharper edge.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":16284,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2005-09-12","keywords":"blonde,topless female nudity,voyeur,voyeurism,dysfunctional family","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Quiet","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi452526361","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE2MGU0NWItYjk2MS00OGE1LWJhOGEtMWUxNDcyNzUwZjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjE2MGU0NWItYjk2MS00OGE1LWJhOGEtMWUxNDcyNzUwZjc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004741/","name":"Camilla Belle"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193846/","name":"Elisha Cuthbert"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004908/","name":"Edie Falco"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0044803/","name":"Jamie Babbit"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186897/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0126219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186711/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1459623/","name":"Abdi Nazemian"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1460116/","name":"Micah Schraft"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Dobri liječnik
programme.desc: The Good Doctor serija je o mladom autističnom kirurgu koji se seli u San Jose kako bi počeo raditi u bolnici. Pratite zbivanja ovog mladog genijalca i njegovu svakodnevnicu! Američka serija The Good Doctor prikazuje život mladog kirurga Shauna Murphyja, autističnoga stručnjaka i genijalca koji ima malo drukčiji pogled od društva na sve oko njega. Seli se iz mjestašca u kojem je preživio teško djetinjstvo u San Jose kako bi radio u bolnici. Kako se snalazi na radnom mjestu i s kojim se sve situacijama susreće, pogledajte u ovoj uzbudljivoj seriji!

credits.actor: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Tamlyn Tomita, Hill Harper, Richard Schiff, Christina Chang, Paige Spara

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Profileri
programme.desc: Francuska serija pod nazivom "Profileri" predstavlja Chloé, kriminalističku psihologinju koja istražuje ubojice kako bi pomogla riješiti slučajeve zločina. Chloé Saint-Laurent je profiler i radi s policijskim timom za rješavanje ubojstva u Parizu. Ona je vrlo draga, nosi jako obojenu odjeću i veliku žutu torbu. Izgleda poput djevojčice koja treba lutku, ali je vrlo pametna i jako dobar profiler. Korak po korak, uklopit će se u tim a njezine kolege, u početku jako pridržane, postaju joj najbolji prijatelji.

programme.title: Candice Renoir
programme.desc: Nakon što se deset godina klonila profesionalnog svijeta, Candice Renoir, plavuša i majka četvero djece, vrhovna je zapovjednica skupine istražitelja. Candice Renoir ima četvero djece, a nije radila deset godina kako bi pratila njezinog muža u inozemstvu. Sada rastavljena od muža, preuzima posao voditeljice istražnog tima javne sigurnosti na jugu Francuske. Na čelu ovog novog tima, ona mora dokazati da je dobra u svom poslu. Iskustvo, vještina promatranja , analitičke sposobnosti i oštroumnost pomažu joj u rješavanju istraga.

credits.actor: Kiefer Sutherland, Natascha McElhone, Paulo Costanzo, Adan Canto, Italia Ricci, LaMonica Garrett, Zoe McLellan, Ben Lawson

programme.title: Škorpion
programme.desc: Genijalci iz tima "Škorpion" pretvaraju se u budale pa im Paige mora pojednostavniti znanost. Njihove su mentalne sposobnosti oslabljene tijekom zadatka u kojem sprječavaju nastanak crne rupe. Genijalci iz tima "Škorpion" pretvaraju se u budale pa im Paige mora pojednostavniti znanost. Njihove su mentalne sposobnosti oslabljene tijekom zadatka u kojem sprječavaju nastanak crne rupe.

programme.title: Elementary
programme.desc: Holmes i Watson traže skriveni motiv kada Cassie Lenue, briljantan mladi kriminalac kojeg su oni strpali u zatvor, zatraži njihovu pomoć u rješavanju ubojstva. Holmes i Watson traže skriveni motiv kada Cassie Lenue, briljantan mladi kriminalac kojeg su oni strpali u zatvor, zatraži njihovu pomoć u rješavanju ubojstva.

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Svaki član NCIS-a mora preuzeti odgovornost za posljedice svojih postupaka, počevši od Pridea. Loretta se uključuje u predizbornu kampanju. Kriminalistička serija pod nazivom Navy CSI New Orleans prikazuje tim specijalnih agenata koji istražuju slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje New Orleansa. Vođa tima agenata jest pravedni i hrabri Dwayne koji strastveno riješava svaki zadatak koji mu je dodijeljen.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Nakon što propadne tajna operacija u slučaju poslovnog čovjeka koji terorističkim činovima manipulira burzom vrijednosnica, ekipa Navy CIS-a traži nove tragove. Uz to, Bishop i Qasim (Rafi Silver)... Nakon što propadne tajna operacija u slučaju poslovnog čovjeka koji terorističkim činovima manipulira burzom vrijednosnica, ekipa Navy CIS-a traži nove tragove. Uz to, Bishop i Qasim (Rafi Silver) zajedno dolaze do prekretnice u slučaju.

programme.title: Navy CIS
programme.desc: Nakon što ugleda brata jednog od "Navy CIS-ovih najtraženijih zločinaca", Gibbs odmah preuzima svoj nekadašnji identitet i odlazi na tajni zadatak u njihovu ozloglašenu protuvladinu miliciju. Uz to,... Nakon što ugleda brata jednog od "Navy CIS-ovih najtraženijih zločinaca", Gibbs odmah preuzima svoj nekadašnji identitet i odlazi na tajni zadatak u njihovu ozloglašenu protuvladinu miliciju. Uz to, Bishop i Reeves surađuju u neslužbenoj istrazi.

programme.title: Navy CIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Svaki član NCIS-a mora preuzeti odgovornost za posljedice svojih postupaka, počevši od Pridea. Loretta se uključuje u predizbornu kampanju. Kriminalistička serija pod nazivom Navy CSI New Orleans prikazuje tim specijalnih agenata koji istražuju slučajeve vezane uz vojno osoblje New Orleansa. Vođa tima agenata jest pravedni i hrabri Dwayne koji strastveno riješava svaki zadatak koji mu je dodijeljen.

programme.title: The Good Heart
Dobro srce
programme.desc:
The Good Heart: Directed by Dagur Kári. With Paul Dano, Brian Cox, Bill Buell, Boði. A cantankerous but ailing bartender takes a kindly young homeless man in under his wing." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0808285/","name":"The Good Heart","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE1MzgyNDM1OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDIzODIyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A cantankerous but ailing bartender takes a kindly young homeless man in under his wing.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0808285/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lee_eisenberg"},"dateCreated":"2010-05-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Iceland has not perished","reviewBody":"Over the past two to three years, Iceland has mostly made news because of its economic meltdown and because of an unpronounceable volcano. Well, I would say that Dagur Kári's movie "The Good Heart" shows that the island still has a lot to offer us.

The movie tells the story of Jacques (Brian Cox) and Lucas (Paul Dano). Jacques is a short-tempered bartender who suffers a heart attack and is put in a hospital bed next to the derelict Lucas. Jacques decides to take Lucas under his wing and teach him the bar-tending business. Although not the nicest person, Jacques is determined to give Lucas a good life. But when Lucas takes unemployed flight attendant April (Isild Le Besco) his wing, the story gets started on an irreversible path.

The movie has really good character development. Just watching Jacques on the screen made me feel as if I was walking on eggshells. It certainly gave me an idea of what it must be like to be a bartender and have to deal with certain kinds of people every day. Even though Jacques is kind of nasty as a person, we understand why he's like this, and by extension get a sense of what Lucas and April have to put up with.

Like I said, it was a real surprise that much of the funding for "The Good Heart" came from Iceland, and that much of the crew and cast is from the North Atlantic island*. This movie could be seen as the manifestation of Ísland's** potential return from its economic collapse during the past few years. I strongly recommend "The Good Heart" and wish Iceland the best. Lofsöngur! 

*Many of the names employed the letter thorn, written Þ (upper case) and þ (lower case).

**That's Iceland's name in Icelandic.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4564,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2010-03-17","keywords":"bar,heart attack,bartender,death,mentor protege relationship","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Good Heart","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1684341785","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQwODc3NjUzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4MjQyMw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTQwODc3NjUzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc4MjQyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A bartender takes a young homeless man in under his wing."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0200452/","name":"Paul Dano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0119144/","name":"Bill Buell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477597/","name":"Dagur Kári"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044919/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024292/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0018704/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0477597/","name":"Dagur Kári"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre
Asterix i Obelix: Misija Kleopatra
programme.desc: Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre: Directed by Alain Chabat. With Gérard Depardieu, Christian Clavier, Jamel Debbouze, Monica Bellucci. Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250223/","name":"Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q3NmUzNjAtM2VjMS00MGU3LWE4YjEtZTM1NDM0YTdlOWRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250223/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jvanhalderen"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"The French are getting the hang of it!!","reviewBody":"Wow! the French are really getting the hang of it. If we look at their first Asterix movie we see a good story with nice actors (especially thanks to Gerard Depardeu)but very lame special effect. In a fantasy story like Asterix Special Effects are really important. Well.. they did it right this time! It looks terrific. I personaly think Mission Cleopatra is the best Asterix story ever written. In the movie there's not one moment you're bored. Go and watch this! One thing! they didnt go exactly by the script which I think is a little bit pittyful. For example, In the comic Obelix breaks the nose of the Sphinx, immediatly all the little storekeepers start breaking of the nose of their miniature Sphinx. (really funny to see)..Well they didnt put it in the movie, instead they burried the nose under the Sphinx. Asterix: "They will never look for it here" (guess again). Was funny but not as good as the original. Another thing i disliked about the movie was their choice for music. It maked the film to childies. But never the less... It's a must C!\n\nGrz Da Jean Holland","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2002-01-30","keywords":"architect,based on comic book,egypt,druid,cleopatra","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979890201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049807/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331453/","name":"René Goscinny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879853/","name":"Albert Uderzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: My Week with Marilyn
Moj tjedan s Marilyn
programme.desc: My Week with Marilyn: Directed by Simon Curtis. With Michelle Williams, Eddie Redmayne, Julia Ormond, Kenneth Branagh. Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1655420/","name":"My Week with Marilyn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODYwOTIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODE2NjAwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957).","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1655420/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jimbecker1956"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Remarkable Performance!","reviewBody":"I just saw this film at the Mill Valley Film Festival and was pretty much blown away. My expectations were low and the very beginning of the film seemed to bear that out. Seeing well-known actors playing very well-known actors can take a little getting used to. But both Kenneth Branagh and Michelle Williams did admirable jobs. Michelle was a revelation. She completely inhabited the role of Marilyn in all of her complexity: her vulnerability, her guile, her sweetness, and her insecurity. This is one of the few performances I've seen where I would say someone is a lock for the Oscar. But this is not only a tour-de-force of acting. It is also a compelling and well-told story of the making of a film and of the competing personalities and agendas involved. Eddie Redmayne was wonderful as Colin, the narrator and main character of the story. Judi Dench was her wonderful, wise self. The cast was filled with wonderful character actors who seemed familiar and comfortable. My brother and I agreed that this was a better film than A King's Speech so on that basis alone it should win Best Picture. At the very least, it was an very entertaining and moving night at the movies.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85323,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2011-11-25","keywords":"marilyn monroe character,laurence olivier character,vivien leigh character,jack cardiff character,arthur miller character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3466567193","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDAxNDQyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY4NTg4Ng@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDAxNDQyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY4NTg4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier's, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during production of The Prince and the Showgirl. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0931329/","name":"Michelle Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519666/","name":"Eddie Redmayne"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000110/","name":"Kenneth Branagh"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193508/","name":"Simon Curtis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150452/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087854/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388130/","name":"Adrian Hodges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1133610/","name":"Colin Clark"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.category: Biography, Drama, Biography, Drama
programme.review: --- Actors: Michelle Williams (role=Marilyn Monroe), Eddie Redmayne (role=Colin Clark), Julia Ormond (role=Vivien Leigh), Kenneth Branagh (role=Sir Laurence Olivier), Pip Torrens (role=Sir Kenneth Clark), Geraldine Somerville (role=Lady Jane Clark), Michael Kitchen (role=Hugh Perceval), Miranda Raison (role=Vanessa), Karl Moffatt (role=Jack Cardiff), Simon Russell Beale (role=Cotes-Preedy), Toby Jones (role=Arthur Jacobs), Robert Portal (role=David Orton)

IMDb data; ttnr: 1655420, Title: My Week with Marilyn, --- Description: My Week with Marilyn: Directed by Simon Curtis. With Michelle Williams, Eddie Redmayne, Julia Ormond, Kenneth Branagh. Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957)." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1655420/","name":"My Week with Marilyn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYzODYwOTIzOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODE2NjAwNw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during the production of The Prince and the Showgirl (1957).","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1655420/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"jimbecker1956","dateCreated":"2011-10-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Remarkable Performance!","reviewBody":"I just saw this film at the Mill Valley Film Festival and was pretty much blown away. My expectations were low and the very beginning of the film seemed to bear that out. Seeing well-known actors playing very well-known actors can take a little getting used to. But both Kenneth Branagh and Michelle Williams did admirable jobs. Michelle was a revelation. She completely inhabited the role of Marilyn in all of her complexity: her vulnerability, her guile, her sweetness, and her insecurity. This is one of the few performances I've seen where I would say someone is a lock for the Oscar. But this is not only a tour-de-force of acting. It is also a compelling and well-told story of the making of a film and of the competing personalities and agendas involved. Eddie Redmayne was wonderful as Colin, the narrator and main character of the story. Judi Dench was her wonderful, wise self. The cast was filled with wonderful character actors who seemed familiar and comfortable. My brother and I agreed that this was a better film than A King's Speech so on that basis alone it should win Best Picture. At the very least, it was an very entertaining and moving night at the movies.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":85323,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.9,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2011-11-25","keywords":"marilyn monroe character,laurence olivier character,vivien leigh character,jack cardiff character,arthur miller character","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3466567193","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDAxNDQyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY4NTg4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NDAxNDQyMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDY4NTg4Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Colin Clark, an employee of Sir Laurence Olivier's, documents the tense interaction between Olivier and Marilyn Monroe during production of The Prince and the Showgirl. ","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0931329/","name":"Michelle Williams","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1519666/","name":"Eddie Redmayne","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000110/","name":"Kenneth Branagh"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193508/","name":"Simon Curtis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0150452/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103694/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0087854/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388130/","name":"Adrian Hodges","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1133610/","name":"Colin Clark"],"duration":"PT1H39M"</script><metacontent="
